pr_title: [#1303] Throw exception instead of returning null.

timeline.bodyText: I'd rephrase this to if the text is not available. A possible reason is, that the node is not part of a valid node model
timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -156,6 +156,7 @@ /** * Returns the parsed text that is covered by this node (including hidden tokens). The result is never null * but may be empty. + * @throws IllegalStateException if text can't be computed because rootNode is 'null'.
